question: This company's CEO overtook Microsoft Bill Gates and become world's richest recently.
explanation: Jeff Bezos was the richest man in the world for a time as a jump in the share price of the US tech giant enabled him to overtake Microsoft founder Bill Gates. He is chairman and chief executive of the Seattle-based company, was worth almost $91billions after Amazon's share price rose more than 1 per cent in morning trading in New York.
